landing.keep_track_of_your_movies_tv_shows_anime: Keep track of your movies, TV shows, anime, books, and games all in one place.
landing.never_lose_track_of_what_you_have_watche: Never lose track of what you've watched, read, or played again.
landing.helps_you_organize_and_track_all_your_en: helps you organize and track all your entertainment across different mediums.
landing.join_thousands_of_users_who_organize_the: Join thousands of users who organize their entertainment with
landing.join_app_today_and_never_lose_track_of_y: Join {app} today and never lose track of your movies, shows, books, and games again.

advantages.stay_on_top_of_all_your_movies_and_tv_sh: Stay on top of all your movies and TV shows — what you've seen, what you're watching, and what's next on your list.
advantages.organize_your_anime_episodes_and_manga_c: Organize your anime episodes and manga chapters across multiple platforms. Watch, read, and remember where you left off!
advantages.track_your_reading_history_rate_books_an: Track your reading history, rate books, and keep your future reading goals all in one tidy place.
advantages.from_single_player_rpgs_to_multiplayer_b: From single-player RPGs to multiplayer battles — log playtime, mark progress, and track your game library like a pro.

reviews.app_has_completely_changed_how_i_keep_tr: {app} has completely changed how I keep track of my shows and movies. I no longer forget where I left off!
reviews.as_an_avid_reader_i_love_being_able_to_t: As an avid reader, I love being able to track my books alongside my other media. The rating system is perfect!
reviews.finally_a_place_where_i_can_track_my_ani: Finally, a place where I can track my anime and games together! The interface is clean and easy to use.

dependencies.app_uses_several_external_apis_to_provid: {app} uses several external APIs to provide data for different media types. We're grateful to these services for making their data available
dependencies.this_product_uses_the_tmdb_api_but_is_no: This product uses the TMDB API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDB.
dependencies.the_movie_database_tmdb_is_a_community_b: The Movie Database (TMDB) is a community built movie and TV database. Every piece of data has been added by our amazing community dating back to 2008. TMDB's international focus and breadth of data is largely unmatched.
dependencies.we_are_currently_evaluating_different_an: We're currently evaluating different anime and manga data providers to integrate with {app}. Once implemented, proper attribution will be provided here.
dependencies.we_are_currently_evaluating_different_bo: We're currently evaluating different book data providers to integrate with {app}. Once implemented, proper attribution will be provided here.
dependencies.we_are_currently_evaluating_different_ga: We're currently evaluating different game data providers to integrate with {app}. Once implemented, proper attribution will be provided here.
